channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside the, feel good factory, 30th July
item.description:
Untaxed vehicle

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Letchworth Drive, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Awful fly tipping, 30th July
item.description:
Dumped roofing insulation, dumped boxes filled with polystyrene. Plus bags of other rubbish and garden waste dumped too. These appear over night. The council does NOTHING. Why haven't they put up a notice to prevent this or a camera to see the criminals who are doing this. No. They just blame the few people who live nearby who are infact the ones who care about the mess and constantly report it. This is disgusting Lambeth - it is a path leading to the school - has to stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lakeview Road, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poorly repaired paving - substandard work, 30th July
item.description:
Hi, The paving outside my property was repaired yesterday, but the work is very poor. 1. The paving stones are uneven. 2. The broken paving stone marked with a dot (which I assume indicated it needed to be replaced), is still there. 3. The paving is not level with the older cemented edges Can someone inspect this work and get the contractor back (with a spirit level and guide lines!) as I believe this work is substandard!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodhurst Avenue, Petts Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path blocked by fly tipping, 30th July
item.description:

item.title: Blocked pavement and highways / parking issue, 30th July
item.description:
The pavement and the parking bay outside 35 The Drive is being taken up with building materials for 35 The Drive. This has been going on for months now and is having an impact on residents and those using the street to walk and park.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Drive, Beckenham, London

item.title: Fly tipped black bags of green waste, 30th July
item.description:
These bags and the undergrowth behind them (budlia) are obstructing the public footpath. This cannot be easy for anyone in a mobility scooter, wheelchair or using a child's pushchair/buggy. This area is clearly a fly-tipping hotspot. The bags need to be removed lest the issue gets worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Slade Green Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Burton Road, London

item.title: Thick weeds and plants in kerb and road, 30th July
item.description:
Sent you pictures some weeks ago and an email , told it was not a priority how bad does it have to become, some areas you cant see tellow lines, some areas will prevent drainage when it rains it is becoming a lane not a street, the road is a state, rubbish is now tangled with the weeds , please clear it
